name: tx2-web
description: A web-based simulator for the TX-2 computer.

scripts.build:dev:webpack-once: npm run symlink:dev && npx webpack --config webpack.development.js
scripts.build:release:webpack-once: npm run symlink:release && npx webpack --config webpack.release.js
scripts.build:profiling:webpack-once: npm run symlink:profiling && npx webpack --config webpack.profiling.js
scripts.build:dev:webpack-with-repeat: npm run build:dev:webpack-once || npm run build:dev:webpack-once
scripts.build:release:webpack-with-repeat: npm run build:release:webpack-once || npm run build:release:webpack-once
scripts.build:profiling:webpack-with-repeat: npm run build:profiling:webpack-once || npm run build:profiling:webpack-once
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:dev:wasm && npm run build:dev:webpack-with-repeat
scripts.build:release: npm run build:release:wasm && npm run build:release:webpack-with-repeat
scripts.build:profiling: npm run build:profiling:wasm && npm run build:profiling:webpack-with-repeat
scripts.serve:dev: npm run symlink:dev && webpack server --config webpack.development.js
scripts.serve:release: npm run symlink:release && webpack server --config webpack.release.js
scripts.serve:profiling: npm run symlink:profiling && webpack server --config webpack.profiling.js

author: James Youngman <youngman@google.com>
